svg.text: ■ Human Input Layer — Real human cognition & behaviour
■ ApeTest v0.1 — Captures 5 structural cognitive traits (EUCs)
■ EUC Block — Recursion, Representation, Compression, etc.
■ Adaptive Interface Layer — Rewrites system communication
■ LLM Layer — Generative cloud of possibility
■ Entropy Engine — Cognitive energy steering & breakthrough flow
■ Symbound Output — Adaptive software, UIs, ChattyOS, Atlas
